name: prep school horrors
description:
Join my discord server if you wish to talk about the current state of the game: https://discord.gg/U4jYBc

Guest music vocals by Ica: https://twitter.com/1caaake

This game is a prequel to this other game: https://adriendittrick.itch.io/there-is-nothing-here

---

Alpha state WIP.

Controls: Arrow keys/WASD: move around.

The game is finishable, and has 8 endings.

You'll know that the game is done once you reach this crude drawing:

Please report any bug or crash you might find.

  • Comments on the game's performance will be appreciated.
    The game is meant to be obscure and metaphorical, so if there is something story-wise which you don't understand, that's normal. However, if there are game mechanics which you don't understand please comment on this page about them.

    V0.2:
  • Fixed the crashing on death issue
  • Added 8 endings
  • Added fullscreen support
